Detailed Description

Base class for all encryption / decryption ciphers.

virtual

Perform decryption to plaintext bytes.

Parameters
[in]mpbArrayCipherPointer to the byte array to decrypt.
[out]mpbArrayPlainTextOutOutput buffer to receive the plaintext.

This function performs decryption and passes the result to the output byte array.

virtual

Perform decryption to plaintext bytes.

Parameters

Perform encryption to a desired encoding.

Parameters
[in]mwsPlainTextThe plaintext string to encrypt.
